</div>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of February&nbsp;21,
2008, there were approximately 86 shareholders of record of our common
stock.&#160; This number does not include
beneficial owners holding shares through nominee names.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On February&nbsp;5,
2008, our Board of Directors renewed its authorization to repurchase up to
$150.0 million of the Class&nbsp;A Common Stock on the open market or through
private transactions.&#160; We did not
repurchase any Class&nbsp;A Common Stock during 2007.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Policy</font></i></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Future dividends on our
common shares, if any, will be at the discretion of our Board of Directors and
will depend on several factors including our results of operations, cash
requirements and surplus, financial condition, covenant restrictions and other
factors that the Board of Directors may deem relevant.&#160; Our Bank Credit Agreement and some of our
subordinated debt instruments have general restrictions on the amount of
dividends that may be paid.&#160; Under the
indentures governing our 8.0% Senior Subordinated Notes, due 2012, we are
restricted from paying dividends on our common stock unless certain specified
conditions are satisfied, including that:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">no event of default then exists under the indenture or
certain other specified agreements relating to our indebtedness; and</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">after taking account of the dividend, we are within
certain restricted payment requirements contained in the indenture.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, under
certain of our senior unsecured debt, the payment of dividends is not
permissible during a default thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Our current dividend of
20 cents per share per quarter is not in excess of any applicable restrictions
or conditions contained within the indentures of our various senior
subordinated notes and our Bank Credit Agreement.&#160; We expect to continue to pay a dividend in
the foreseeable future.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">29</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='29',FILE='C:\JMS\pmarsha\08-2529-1\task2741368\2529-1-bm.htm',USER='pmarsha',CD='Feb 29 03:09 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During 2007, the Board of Directors voted to increase
the dividend twice.&#160; On February&nbsp;14,
2007, we announced that our Board of Directors approved an increase to our
annual dividend to 60 cents per share from 50 cents per share.&#160; On October&nbsp;31, 2007, we announced that
our Board of Directors approved an increase to our annual dividend to 70 cents
per share from 60 cents per share.&#160; We
began paying this dividend rate in the first quarter 2008.&#160; On February&nbsp;6, 2008, we announced that
our Board of Directors approved an increase to our annual dividend to 80 cents
per share from 70 cents per share.&#160; We
intend to declare dividend distributions in each future quarter.&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The 2007 and 2006 dividends declared were as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.4%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="27%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:27.44%;">

  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.4%;">

</div>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Convertible Note Repurchases</font></i></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;On January&nbsp;22,
2007, we used the proceeds from our $225.0 million Term Loan A-1 along with
$59.4 million of cash on hand and additional borrowings of $23.0 million under
our Revolving Credit Facility to redeem the aggregate principal amount of our
$307.4 million 8.75% Senior Subordinated Notes, due 2011 (the 8.75%
Notes).&#160; The redemption was effected in
accordance with the terms of the indenture governing the 8.75% Notes at a redemption
price of 104.375% of the principal amount of the 8.75% Notes plus accrued and
unpaid interest.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On June&nbsp;11,
2007 and June&nbsp;18, 2007, we partially redeemed $300.0 million and $45.0
million, respectively, of our existing 8.0% Senior Subordinated Notes, due 2012
(the 8.0% Notes) at a redemption price of 104% of the principal amount of the
8.0% Notes plus accrued and unpaid interest with net proceeds from the offering
of the 3.0% Convertible Senior Notes, due 2027 (the 3.0% Notes) and cash on
hand.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition to the
partial redemption noted above, during 2007 we repurchased, in the open market,
$9.9 million face value of the 8.0% Notes.&#160;
During January&nbsp;2008, we repurchased, in the open market, $6.9
million face value of the 8.0% Notes.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.52%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ITEM 6.</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.48%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SELECTED FINANCIAL DATA<a name="SelectedFinancialData_204421"></a></font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h2 align="left" style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h2>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
selected consolidated financial data for the years ended December&nbsp;31,
2007, 2006, 2005, 2004 and 2003 have been derived from our audited consolidated
financial statements.&#160; The consolidated
financial statements for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2007, 2006 and 2005
are included elsewhere in this report.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

  <td width="7%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:7.14%;">
  <p align="right" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">53,977</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.14%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 1.5pt;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:1.3%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>

  <p align="right" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">207,129</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:2.16%;">

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Net broadcast revenues&#148; is defined as
broadcast revenues, net of agency commissions.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Depreciation and amortization includes
amortization of program contract costs and net realizable value adjustments,
depreciation and amortization of property and equipment and amortization of
definite-lived intangible broadcasting assets, other assets and costs related
to excess syndicated programming.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subsidiary trust minority expense
represents the distributions on the HYTOPS and amortization of deferred finance
costs.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Total debt&#148; is defined as notes payable,
capital leases and commercial bank financing, including the current and
long-term portions.&#160; Total debt does not
include our preferred stock, in applicable years related balances were
outstanding including 2004 and 2003.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.52%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ITEM 7.</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.48%;">
  <p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MANAGEMENT&#146;S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL
  CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS<a name="ManagementsDiscussionAndAnalysisO_204425"></a></font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="color:windowtext;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-indent:-.75in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.25in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">The following
Management&#146;s Discussion and Analysis provides qualitative and quantitative
information about our financial performance and condition and should be read in
conjunction with our consolidated financial statements and the accompanying
notes to those statements.&#160; This
discussion consists of the following sections:</font></i></b></h4>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:.25in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h4>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Executive Overview</font></u></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> &#151; a description of our business,
financial highlights from 2007, information about industry trends and sources
of revenues and operating costs;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Critical Accounting Policies and
Estimates</font></u></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> &#151; a
discussion of the accounting policies that are most important in understanding
the assumptions and judgments incorporated in the consolidated financial
statements and a summary of recent accounting pronouncements;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Results of Operations</font></u></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> &#151; a summary of the components of our
revenues by category and by network affiliation, a summary of other operating
data and an analysis of our revenues and expenses for 2007, 2006 and 2005,
including comparisons between years and expectations for 2008; and</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Liquidity and Capital Resources</font></u></i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> &#151; a discussion of our primary sources of
liquidity, an analysis of our cash flows from or used in operating activities,
investing activities and financing activities, a discussion of our dividend
policy and a summary of our contractual cash obligations and off-balance sheet
arrangements.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal;">EXECUTIVE OVERVIEW</font></i></b></h4>

<h4 style="color:windowtext;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h4>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We
believe that we are one of the largest and most diversified television
broadcasting companies in the United States.&#160;
We currently own, provide programming and operating services pursuant to
local marketing agreements (LMAs) or provide, or are provided, sales services
pursuant to outsourcing agreements to 58 television stations in 35
markets.&#160; For the purpose of this report,
these 58 stations are referred to as &#147;our&#148; stations.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">32</font></p>

<div style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='32',FILE='C:\JMS\pmarsha\08-2529-1\task2741368\2529-1-bm.htm',USER='pmarsha',CD='Feb 29 03:09 2008' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We
believe that owning duopolies and operating stations under LMAs or providing
sales and related services under outsourcing agreements enables us to
accomplish two very important strategic business objectives: increasing our
share of revenues available in each market and operating television stations
more efficiently by minimizing costs.&#160; We
constantly monitor revenue share and cost efficiencies and we aggressively
pursue opportunities to improve both by using new technology and by sharing
best practices among our station groups.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sinclair
Television Group,&nbsp;Inc. (STG), a wholly owned subsidiary of Sinclair
Broadcast Group,&nbsp;Inc. (SBG), is the primary obligor under our existing
Bank Credit Agreement, as amended and the 8.0% Senior Subordinated Notes, due
2012.&#160; Our Class&nbsp;A Common Stock, Class&nbsp;B
Common Stock, the 6.0% Convertible Debentures, due 2012, the 4.875% Convertible
Senior Notes, due 2018 and the 3.0% Convertible Senior Notes, due 2027 remain
obligations or securities of SBG and are not obligations or securities of STG.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2007 Highlights</font></i></b></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In January&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
three-year retransmission consent agreement with Time Warner Cable for the
carriage of the analog and digital signals of 35 stations in 22 markets,
representing approximately 6.0 million of Time Warner&#146;s subscribers;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In January&nbsp;2007, we redeemed in
full, our 8.75% Senior Subordinated Notes, due 2011, which resulted in a $15.7
million loss on extinguishment of debt;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In February&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
three-year retransmission consent agreement with Mediacom Communications
Corporation for the carriage of the analog and digital signals of 24 stations
in 16 markets, representing approximately 0.7 million of Mediacom&#146;s subscribers;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In March&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
four-year renewal of our retransmission consent agreement with Comcast
Corporation for the carriage of the analog and digital signals of 37 stations
in 23 markets, representing approximately 3.4 million of Comcast&#146;s cable
subscribers;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In April&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
retransmission consent agreement with Charter Communications,&nbsp;Inc. for the
carriage of the analog and digital signals of 28 stations in 19 markets,
representing approximately 1.9 million subscribers;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In April&nbsp;2007, our FOX affiliate,
KOKH-TV in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma expanded its Monday through Friday news
offering through the addition of a three-hour morning newscast;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In April&nbsp;2007, we joined the Open
Mobile Video Coalition, a voluntary association of television broadcasters
whose mission it is to accelerate the development of mobile digital broadcast
television;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In May&nbsp;2007, we acquired Triangle
Sign&nbsp;&amp; Service,&nbsp;Inc., a Baltimore-based company whose primary
business is to design and fabricate commercial signs for retailers, sports
complexes and other commercial businesses for $15.9 million, net of cash
acquired;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In May&nbsp;2007, we completed an
offering of $345.0 million aggregate principal amount of 3.0% Convertible
Senior Notes, due 2027, and used the proceeds to partially redeem our 8.0%
Senior Subordinated Notes, due 2012 generating a $15.0 million loss on
extinguishment of debt;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In June&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
retransmission consent agreement with COX Communications,&nbsp;Inc. for the
carriage of the analog and digital signals of nine stations in six markets,
representing approximately 1.3 million subscribers;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In July&nbsp;2007, we acquired FBP
Holding Company, LLC (FBP Holding), which holds an investment in a commercial
warehouse property located in Baltimore, Maryland, for $8.3 million including
$7.1 million in the assumption of debt.&#160;
Debt assumed in conjunction with this acquisition is non-recourse to us;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In July&nbsp;2007, we entered into an
agreement to sell the assets of WGGB-TV in Springfield, Massachusetts,
including the FCC license to an unrelated third party for $21.2 million in
cash.&#160; The sale closed on November&nbsp;1,
2007;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In September&nbsp;2007, we acquired Bagby
Investors, LLC (Bagby), which holds an investment in a commercial office
building in Baltimore, Maryland, for $16.9 million, net of cash acquired;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In September&nbsp;2007, we entered into a
news share agreement in which WFLA-TV will produce a newscast to air on WTTA,
bringing more local news coverage to the Tampa Bay area;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In November&nbsp;2007, we entered into
agreements with CBS for the renewal of our two CBS television station
affiliations.&#160; The agreements, which
cover WGME-TV in Portland, Maine and KGAN-TV in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, have
five-year terms that terminate on December&nbsp;31, 2012;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In November&nbsp;2007, we acquired Alarm
Funding, a regional security alarm operating and bulk acquisitions company for
$4.9 million, net of cash acquired;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In December&nbsp;2007, we expanded the
news on WEAR-TV in Pensacola, Florida by adding a one-hour, four&nbsp;p.m. news
program;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#183;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During 2007, we invested $17.0 million in
various real estate ventures including developmental land and apartment and
shopping complexes;</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33</font></p>
